programme.title: Suffocating in an Ocean of Advertising
programme.short_synopsis: The bombardment of Presidential election adverts becomes too much for Alistair Cooke.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke looks forward with pleasure to the Presidential election and an end to wall-to-wall lobbying and advertising.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
